title: Lost
creator_credit: Jo Kennedy, Ros Walker and Clare Sawyer
brief_description: Three small children have been wandering a city beach. What begins as a seemingly routine case for detectives in Missing Persons becomes a puzzle. Twenty-four hours later no one has reported them missing and the police start to worry. Why can’t they locate their parents and why won’t the children speak?
creator_credit_for_label: Jo Kennedy, Ros Walker and Clare Sawyer
